channel.title: Ashwater
channel.description: A minimal blog about self-hosting, Linux, and tinkering with technology

item.title: Tiny AI, Big Dreams: Running a Language Model on a $15 Computer
item.description: How a 15-million parameter AI generates daily stories on a Raspberry Pi Zero 2 W, and what it means for the future of local inference.

item.title: Hello World
item.description: The first post from my tiny Pi-powered blog
